ThenActions.Title: %ExecutingMacro%
ThenActions.Prompt:
Macro %ExecutingThisMacro% encountered an error:

A parameter must be supplied, in the following format:

browser|url|reload

browser:	Must be "Safari" or "Google Chrome"
url:		The desired URL
reload:	Optional. 1 means that if a tab exists with the url,
		it should be reloaded. 0 means leave it as is.
		Default is 0.

ThenActions.Title: %ExecutingMacro%
ThenActions.ActionName: Prompt error with cancel: 'An error has occurred'
